description:
Blair's got that Boy Next Door thing goin on big time.
He's from up North, so has a touch of a Cheese country accent that is incredibly charming.
He is also part chameleon or maybe uh...squid (Ok, so I know that's not very complimentary). I have never seen anyone change color so quickly when they cum. If you play his cumshot over and over, he goes from slightly flushed to bright red in seconds, you can see it wash over him. It's pretty cool!
Not sure I can talk him in to coming back, but he did indicate he might be willing to get a blow job. So I will keep workin on him!
title: Blair - Solo
